survey_name: Higher Education Digital Learning Tools Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate student and faculty satisfaction with digital learning tools used in higher education institutions, focusing on usability, effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital learning tools do you use regularly in your courses? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Learning Management System (e.g., Blackboard, Canvas, Moodle)
Video Conferencing Tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
questions.client_notes: Consider using a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select all applicable tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
